name: Lil' Tapes Way Out
description:
Lil' Tape is a Cassette Tape.

He is on an adventure to find the perfect tape player to rewind in.

On his adventures he runs in to many milennials, who attempt to break him and touch his tapes.

Can you help him find the perfect tape player?

This is the first game that I have ever made, and it is an entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

It doesn't support game pad

Control with arrow keys and space bar or shift
